name: SleepMindfulness
0:
”Alexa, open sleep mindfulness”
”Alexa, start sleep mindfulness”
”Alexa, launch sleep mindfulness”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep mindfulness
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Mindfulness is the Alexa skill that lets you experience guided Mindfulness sessions anytime you wish. Featuring over 10 different meditations, with a variety of voices and soothing background sounds. The duration of meditation sessions can vary from 10, 20 and 30 minutes.

With the Pro Features you will access to :

• Professional meditation voices
• A variety of background sounds perfect for your sessions
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Continuously updated meditation paths
• Access to all available durations of meditations

We’d love to hear your feedback to help us improve and provide the best guided meditation experience.

Enjoy your relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
